                              * Anything above 0 reduces taken dmg.
                              * Anything below 0 increases taken dmg.

ANss.name: Spell Shield
ANss.raw_text:
* Blocks 1 spell and then requires a cooldown.
                              * If used as an ability, it can be actively used. This can be pretty dangerous when a secondary effect is placed with triggers to this ability (Daffa)
                              * It will not trigger a normal spell block if you actively use it and it is on cooldown.
                              * Seems to not work correctly with upgrades and tech requirements: Will trigger even if tech is not researched and won’t level up from upgrades. (KitsuneTailsPrower)
                              * Giving this ability a mana cost will cause the ability to consume mana when it is activated. If the mana cost is more than the unit’s current mana, the spell shield still block spell but the ability will not go into cooldown, effectively creating an infinite spell shield. (Patch 1.30.4)

ANpr.name: Staff of Preservation
ANpr.raw_text: * Teleports targeted unit to highest tier townhall, or another factory if not applicable

ANsa.name: Staff of Sanctuary
ANsa.raw_text:
* Unit/Hero regeneration delay is the time it takes until they start healing.
                              * At negative it’s treated as 0.
                              * Hit points per second is how much it heals a second.
                              * At negative values it does damage your unit until it dies.
                              * Unless it gets fully healed from another source and the effect is broken.
                              * Magic Damage Reduction does not in fact appear to do anything at all, the units appears “spell immune”.

AImt.name: Staff of Teleportation
AImt.raw_text: * This is a copy of the archmage ultimate.

Aste.name: Steal
Aste.notes: Steals health or mana from a target.
Aste.raw_text:
* Used by the item Wand of Mana Stealing.
                              * Seems to function like Dark Ritual, but seems to not always work as intended.

Aret.name: Tome of Retraining
Aret.raw_text: * Unlearns all spells and allow for you to pick new ones.

AIpv.name: Vampiric Potion
AIpv.raw_text:
* “Data - Life Steal Amount”
                              * Negative values causes unit to take damage instead.
                              * Ignores invulnerable status.
                              * “Data - Damage Bonus”
                              * Negative values causes damage loss.

Ashs.name: Wand Of Shadowsight
Ashs.raw_text:
* A copy of Faerie Fire, except it doesn’t reduce armor, and its duration is permanent. It Can be dispelled though. (RoyGBV)
                              * Doesn’t appear to have an order string in the ability editor, but it actually does. The order string is “shadowsight” with order number 852570 (EternalOne)

Sca1.name: Chaos / -Berserker Upgrade
Sca1.notes: This is the ultimate Morph Ability tbh. Simple and quick and good for triggers, has some glaring issues tho.
Sca1.raw_text:
* Morphs unit into another unit once the techtree requirements have been met.
                              * Basically it is a permanent Metamorphosis that does not require casting
                              * If a chaos ability is available on a building, won’t cast it as long as the building is training/researching/upgrading
                              * Cases to test
                              * When the caster is paused
                              * When the caster is hidden
                              * When the caster is stunned
                              * The new unit update its attack damage which is calculated by merging damage of both units.
                              * If the hero has an ability that gives permanent health it causes the hero to gain immense amounts of health. Eventually overflowing.
                              * Heroes that are Chaos keep their spot in the hero list, along with any control group they are in.
                              * Units also keep their control group.
                              * The hero keeps their current attributes.
                              * The hero keeps their current Str/Agi/Int per level.
                              * Other Hero related information will also be kept (like Hero abilities/XP/Level) and will not be overwritten by heroic abilities from the other hero.
                              * Normal abilities will be overwritten by the normal abilities on the new hero.
                              * If any item or aura buff obtained (i.e. providing bonus armor), it's effect may become part of the unit forever, which heavily limits usage of this ability in common. Interaction depends on the base ability which is the source of the bonus.
                              * The instance API and Skin system might be a better choice in 1.32+ instead of this ability.
                              * However changing skin is limited through what the triggers can change on a unit, for example setting a unit weapon range is bugged
                              * Setting a unit skin removes permanently its shadow, even if you set it to the original skin (2.0)
                              * Increases the RAM usage of the unit since it is duplicated and replaced at every morph
                              * Can cause very rare desync when there’s multiple morphs in the same map. It desync once and works fine for the rest of the game (like a thanos snap)
                              * When the unit has multiple valid chaos abilities, the last one in the list will be used
                              * Beware of infinite loop or it will lag a lot

AIf2.name: Item Attack Heal Reduction Bonus
AIf2.notes: This reduces healing effects from most hit point regeneration sources.
AIf2.raw_text:
* Multiple copies of the ability do not appear to stack. More testing is needed.
                              * The most recent buff applied by a copy of this ability takes precedence.
                              * “Data - Healing Multiplier”
                              * Values higher than 1.00 will amplify healing effects.
                              * This may cause a visual bug where the buff will not show up.
                              * You may experience no effect and even new Orb of Fire item does not appear when put on ground. Go to Map Options > Game Data Set: Melee (Lastest Patch) as new items such as Orb of Fire and Orb of Lightning is updated but does not appear on Default data set of 1.31 version.
                              * Values lower than 1.00 will reduce healing effects.
                              * Values lower than or equal to 0 will be treated as 0.01.

Alea.name: UnselectAble (Internal name: CAbilityLeash)
Alea.notes: Need to be defined in units/abilitydata.slk
Alea.raw_text:
* Makes an Unit unselectable but targetable.
                              * returns "attack" to abi Gained Position when aoe away.
                              * Hide & Unhide -> Selectable but still returns on aoe distance.
                              * Remove Abi unit Hide & unit Unhide unit is normal again.[ap] (Aloc ability inherit this property)
